name: Rocket Frog
description:
Rocket Frog is an amusing, action-packed precision platformer. Chester will test your patience and try your skill, blasting through the scenic hills, cities, lakes, and mountains.
Can he overcome this critical test of physics, trying out Dr. Toad's and Dr. Frog's rocket boots and magnetic bowling ball?

Gameplay Features:

-A challenging platformer!

-Charge the rocket boots to elevate your jumps!

-Wrestle against the weight of the magnetic bowling ball!

-Each Level gets more difficult the farther you go!

-Collect Infrognito Outfits!

-Collect Music CDs and Dr. Toad Tokens!

-Bonus unlockables!
